name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
summary: Occidental Petroleum Corporation (Oxy) is a leading American oil and gas exploration and production company with major operations in the United States and the Middle East. The company also operates a significant chemicals business through its subsidiary, Occidental Chemical Corporation, and has recently invested in carbon capture and sustainability initiatives. Headquartered in Houston, Oxy is publicly traded on the NYSE and ranks among the largest energy companies in the U.S.
